rules.natural: If the tool is available, then provided that the plant is healthy, the workshop is successful.
Whenever the skill is acquired, it follows that if the plant is healthy, then the workshop is successful.
Whenever the skill is practiced, then given that the plant is monitored, it follows that if the workshop is not successful, then the plant is broken.
Provided that the skill is demonstrated, then whenever the plant is monitored, it follows that if the workshop is not successful, then the plant is broken.
Either the skill is at expert level, or the skill is practiced, or the skill is demonstrated.
If the plant is thriving, then the workshop is successful.
Either the workshop is professional, or if the workshop being organized does not imply the plant is thriving, then the workshop is not chaotic.
If the skill is available, then the furniture is repaired.
Either the skill is available or the electronic device is damaged.
Under the condition that the electronic device is damaged, then if the tool is tested, it follows that whenever the workshop is not successful, then the plant is broken.
If the furniture is repaired, then provided that the tool is tested, it follows that if the workshop is not successful, then the plant is broken.
Whenever the electronic device is functional, then the workshop is organized.
Under the condition that the workshop is organized, then the plant is healthy.
Provided that the furniture is available, then the skill is acquired.
Either the furniture is available or the tool is available.
If the workshop being organized does not imply the plant is thriving, then the workshop is chaotic.

facts.natural: It is not the case that the plant is broken.
The skill is not at expert level.
It is not the case that the workshop is professional.

If the workshop is not successful, then the plant is broken.
If the furniture is available, then provided that the plant is healthy, it follows that the workshop is successful.
Whenever the plant is healthy, then the workshop is successful.
If the workshop is organized, then the workshop is successful.
If the electronic device is functional, then the workshop is successful.
Either the skill is practiced or the skill is demonstrated.
Under the condition that the plant is monitored, if the workshop is not successful, then the plant is broken.
If the workshop is not successful, then the plant is broken.
Under the condition that the workshop being organized does not imply the plant is thriving, then the workshop is not chaotic.
Provided that the workshop is organized, then the plant is thriving.
If the workshop is organized, then the workshop is successful.
If the electronic device is functional, then the workshop is successful.

(A10 → (A8 → G)).natural: If the tool is available, then provided that the plant is healthy, the workshop is successful.

(A11 → (A8 → G)).natural: Whenever the skill is acquired, it follows that if the plant is healthy, then the workshop is successful.

(A12 → (¬G → A1)).natural: Under the condition that the plant is monitored, if the workshop is not successful, then the plant is broken.

(A13 → (A12 → (¬G → A1))).natural: Whenever the skill is practiced, then given that the plant is monitored, it follows that if the workshop is not successful, then the plant is broken.

(A13 ∨ A14).natural: Either the skill is practiced or the skill is demonstrated.

(A14 → (A12 → (¬G → A1))).natural: Provided that the skill is demonstrated, then whenever the plant is monitored, it follows that if the workshop is not successful, then the plant is broken.

(A15 ∨ (A13 ∨ A14)).natural: Either the skill is at expert level, or the skill is practiced, or the skill is demonstrated.

(A16 → G).natural: If the plant is thriving, then the workshop is successful.

(A18 ∨ (¬(A7 → A16) → ¬A17)).natural: Either the workshop is professional, or if the workshop being organized does not imply the plant is thriving, then the workshop is not chaotic.

(A2 → (¬G → A1)).natural: If the tool is tested, then under the condition that the workshop is not successful, it follows that the plant is broken.

(A3 → (A2 → (¬G → A1))).natural: Provided that the skill is available, then if the tool is tested, it follows that whenever the workshop is not successful, then the plant is broken.

(A3 → A5).natural: If the skill is available, then the furniture is repaired.

(A3 ∨ A4).natural: Either the skill is available or the electronic device is damaged.

(A4 → (A2 → (¬G → A1))).natural: Under the condition that the electronic device is damaged, then if the tool is tested, it follows that whenever the workshop is not successful, then the plant is broken.

(A5 → (A2 → (¬G → A1))).natural: If the furniture is repaired, then provided that the tool is tested, it follows that if the workshop is not successful, then the plant is broken.

(A6 → A7).natural: Whenever the electronic device is functional, then the workshop is organized.

(A6 → G).natural: If the electronic device is functional, then the workshop is successful.

(A7 → A16).natural: Provided that the workshop is organized, then the plant is thriving.

(A7 → A8).natural: Under the condition that the workshop is organized, then the plant is healthy.

(A7 → G).natural: If the workshop is organized, then the workshop is successful.

(A8 → G).natural: Whenever the plant is healthy, then the workshop is successful.

(A9 → (A8 → G)).natural: If the furniture is available, then provided that the plant is healthy, it follows that the workshop is successful.

(A9 → A11).natural: Provided that the furniture is available, then the skill is acquired.

(A9 ∨ A10).natural: Either the furniture is available or the tool is available.

(¬(A7 → A16) → A17).natural: If the workshop being organized does not imply the plant is thriving, then the workshop is chaotic.

(¬(A7 → A16) → ¬A17).natural: Under the condition that the workshop being organized does not imply the plant is thriving, then the workshop is not chaotic.

(¬G → A1).natural: If the workshop is not successful, then the plant is broken.

¬A1.natural: It is not the case that the plant is broken.

¬A15.natural: The skill is not at expert level.

¬A18.natural: It is not the case that the workshop is professional.
